title: Animal magnetism and MESMERISMUS® / Dr. Paret
description:
Mesmerismus © is a registered name. We use to give a quality and originality stamp to what we are doing. Our mesmerism © re-establishes the connection with nature. Our school is the main source for these techniques. Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
